00048 /* Private types -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 typedef __PACKED_H struct
00050 {
00051   u8 modifier;
00052   u8 reserved;
00053   u8 keycode[6];
00054 } __PACKED_F KeyboardReport_TypeDef;
00055

00063 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00064 #define CLASS_DESC_OFFSET                   (18)
00065 
00066 #define CLASS_REQ_01_GET_RPOT               (u16)(0x1 << 8)
00067 #define CLASS_REQ_02_GET_IDLE               (u16)(0x2 << 8)
00068 #define CLASS_REQ_03_GET_PTCO               (u16)(0x3 << 8)
00069 #define CLASS_REQ_09_SET_RPOT               (u16)(0x9 << 8)
00070 #define CLASS_REQ_0A_SET_IDLE               (u16)(0xA << 8)
00071 #define CLASS_REQ_0B_SET_PTCO               (u16)(0xB << 8)
00072 
00073 #define HID_RPOT_TYPE_01_INPUT              (0x01)
00074 #define HID_RPOT_TYPE_02_OUTPUT             (0x02)
00075 #define HID_RPOT_TYPE_03_FEATURE            (0x03)
00076 
00077 #define HID_LED_1_MASK      (0x1)
00078 #define HID_LED_2_MASK      (0x2)
00079 #define HID_LED_3_MASK      (0x4)
00080 #define HID_LED_1_BIT       (0)
00081 #define HID_LED_2_BIT       (1)
00082 #define HID_LED_3_BIT       (2)
00083 
00084 #define CLASS_REQ_FE_GET_MAX_LUN            (u16)(0xFE  << 8)
00085 #define CLASS_REQ_FF_BOMSR                  (u16)(0xFF  << 8)
00086

00124 /* USB HID Report Descriptor                                                                                */
00125 __ALIGN4 static uc8 USB_HID_ReportDesc[] = {
00126     0x05, 0x01,                    // USAGE_PAGE (Generic Desktop)
00127     0x09, 0x06,                    // USAGE (Keyboard)
00128     0xa1, 0x01,                    // COLLECTION (Application)
00129 
00130     0x05, 0x07,                    //   USAGE_PAGE (Keyboard)
00131     0x19, 0xe0,                    //   USAGE_MINIMUM (Keyboard LeftControl)
00132     0x29, 0xe7,                    //   USAGE_MAXIMUM (Keyboard Right GUI)
00133     0x15, 0x00,                    //   LOGICAL_MINIMUM (0)
00134     0x25, 0x01,                    //   LOGICAL_MAXIMUM (1)
00135     0x75, 0x01,                    //   REPORT_SIZE (1)
00136     0x95, 0x08,                    //   REPORT_COUNT (8)
00137     0x81, 0x02,                    //   INPUT (Data, Var, Abs)
00138 
00139     0x95, 0x01,                    //   REPORT_COUNT (1)
00140     0x75, 0x08,                    //   REPORT_SIZE (8)
00141     0x81, 0x03,                    //   INPUT (Cnst, Var, Abs)
00142 
00143     0x95, 0x03,                    //   REPORT_COUNT (3)
00144     0x75, 0x01,                    //   REPORT_SIZE (1)
00145     0x05, 0x08,                    //   USAGE_PAGE (LEDs)
00146     0x19, 0x01,                    //   USAGE_MINIMUM (Num Lock)
00147     0x29, 0x03,                    //   USAGE_MAXIMUM (Kana)
00148     0x91, 0x02,                    //   OUTPUT (Data, Var, Abs)
00149 
00150     0x95, 0x01,                    //   REPORT_COUNT (1)
00151     0x75, 0x05,                    //   REPORT_SIZE (5)
00152     0x91, 0x03,                    //   OUTPUT (Cnst, Var, Abs)
00153 
00154     0x95, 0x06,                    //   REPORT_COUNT (6)
00155     0x75, 0x08,                    //   REPORT_SIZE (8)
00156     0x15, 0x00,                    //   LOGICAL_MINIMUM (0)
00157     0x25, 0x65,                    //   LOGICAL_MAXIMUM (101)
00158     0x05, 0x07,                    //   USAGE_PAGE (Keyboard)
00159     0x19, 0x00,                    //   USAGE_MINIMUM (Reserved (no event indicated))
00160     0x29, 0x65,                    //   USAGE_MAXIMUM (Keyboard Application)
00161     0x81, 0x00,                    //   INPUT (Data, Ary, Abs)
00162 
00163     0xc0                           // END_COLLECTION
00164 };
00165 
00166 static u32 gOutputReportBuffer;
00167 __ALIGN4 static u8 gInputReportBuffer[64];
00168 
00169 static vu32 gIsSetOutputReport = FALSE;
00170 static vu32 gIsEP1INEmpty = TRUE;
00171 __ALIGN4 static KeyboardReport_TypeDef gKeyboardReport;
00172 static u32 gIsKeySent = FALSE;
00173 
00174 static u32 gIsOUTReady = FALSE;
00175 static u32 gIsINEmpty = FALSE;
00176 
00177 /* Global Function -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00178 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00179   * @brief  USB Class initialization.
00180   * @param  pClass: pointer of USBDCore_Class_TypeDef
00181   * @retval None
00182   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00183 void USBDClass_Init(USBDCore_Class_TypeDef *pClass)
00184 {
00185   s32 i;
00186   pClass->CallBack_MainRoutine.func = USBDClass_MainRoutine;
00187   //pClass->CallBack_MainRoutine.uPara = (u32)NULL;
00188 
00189   pClass->CallBack_Reset.func = USBDClass_Reset;
00190   //pClass->CallBack_Reset.uPara = (u32)NULL;
00191 
00192   //pClass->CallBack_StartOfFrame.func = USBDClass_StartOfFrame;
00193   //pClass->CallBack_StartOfFrame.uPara = (u32)NULL;
00194 
00195   pClass->CallBack_ClassGetDescriptor = USBDClass_Standard_GetDescriptor;
00196   //pClass->CallBack_ClassSetInterface = USBDClass_Standard_SetInterface;
00197   //pClass->CallBack_ClassGetInterface = USBDClass_Standard_GetInterface;
00198 
00199   pClass->CallBack_ClassRequest = USBDClass_Request;
00200   pClass->CallBack_EPTn[1] = USBDClass_Endpoint1;
00201   pClass->CallBack_EPTn[2] = USBDClass_Endpoint2;
00202   pClass->CallBack_EPTn[3] = USBDClass_Endpoint3;
00203   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[4] = USBDClass_Endpoint4;
00204   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[5] = USBDClass_Endpoint5;
00205   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[6] = USBDClass_Endpoint6;
00206   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[7] = USBDClass_Endpoint7;
00207 
00208   #ifdef RETARGET_IS_USB
00209   pClass->CallBack_EPTn[RETARGET_RX_EPT] = SERIAL_USBDClass_RXHandler;
00210   #endif
00211 
00212   gKeyboardReport.modifier = 0;
00213   for (i = 5; i >=0; i--)
00214   {
00215     gKeyboardReport.keycode[i] = 0;
00216   }
00217 
00218   BOT_Init();
00219 
00220   return;
00221 }
00222 
00223 /* Private functions ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00224 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00225   * @brief  USB Class main routine.
00226   * @param  uPara: Parameter for Class main routine
00227   * @retval None
00228   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00229 static void USBDClass_MainRoutine(u32 uPara)
00230 {
00231   USBDClass_ReportProcess();
00232   USBDClass_EPT1INProcess();
00233 
00234   if (gIsOUTReady == TRUE)
00235   {
00236     gIsOUTReady = FALSE;
00237     BOT_OUTProcess();
00238   }
00239 
00240   if (gIsINEmpty == TRUE)
00241   {
00242     gIsINEmpty = FALSE;
00243     BOT_INProcess();
00244   }
00245 
00246   return;
00247 }
00248 
00249 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00250   * @brief  USB Class Report Process for application.
00251   * @retval None
00252   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00253 static void USBDClass_ReportProcess(void)
00254 {
00255   if (gIsSetOutputReport == TRUE)
00256   {
00257     gIsSetOutputReport = FALSE;
00258     (gOutputReportBuffer & HID_LED_1_MASK) ? HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED1) : HT32F_DVB_LEDOff(HT_LED1);
00259     (gOutputReportBuffer & HID_LED_2_MASK) ? HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED2) : HT32F_DVB_LEDOff(HT_LED2);
00260     (gOutputReportBuffer & HID_LED_3_MASK) ? HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED3) : HT32F_DVB_LEDOff(HT_LED3);
00261   }
00262 
00263   return;
00264 }
00265 
00266 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00267   * @brief  USB Class Endpoint 1 IN Process for application.
00268   * @retval None
00269   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00270 static void USBDClass_EPT1INProcess(void)
00271 {
00272   s32 i = 0;
00273 
00274   for (i = 5; i >=0; i--)
00275   {
00276     gKeyboardReport.keycode[i] = 0;
00277   }
00278 
00279   i = 0;
00280   if (gKeyStatus[HID_KEY_NUMLOCK])
00281   {
00282     gKeyStatus[HID_KEY_NUMLOCK] = 0;
00283     gKeyboardReport.keycode[i++] = 0x53;
00284   }
00285 
00286   if (gKeyStatus[HID_KEY_CAPSLOCK])
00287   {
00288     gKeyStatus[HID_KEY_CAPSLOCK] = 0;
00289     gKeyboardReport.keycode[i++] = 0x39;
00290   }
00291 
00292   if (gKeyStatus[HID_KEY_SCROLLLOCK])
00293   {
00294     gKeyStatus[HID_KEY_SCROLLLOCK] = 0;
00295     gKeyboardReport.keycode[i++] = 0x47;
00296   }
00297 
00298   if (i != 0 && gIsEP1INEmpty == TRUE)
00299   {
00300     gIsEP1INEmpty = FALSE;
00301     USBDCore_EPTWriteINData(USBD_EPT1, (u32 *)&gKeyboardReport, sizeof(gKeyboardReport));
00302     gIsKeySent = TRUE;
00303   }
00304   else if (i == 0 && gIsKeySent == TRUE && gIsEP1INEmpty == TRUE)
00305   {
00306     gIsEP1INEmpty = FALSE;
00307     USBDCore_EPTWriteINData(USBD_EPT1, (u32 *)&gKeyboardReport, sizeof(gKeyboardReport));
00308     gIsKeySent = FALSE;
00309   }
00310 
00311   return;
00312 }
00313 
00314 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00315   * @brief  USB Class Reset.
00316   * @param  uPara: Parameter for Class Reset.
00317   * @retval None
00318   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00319 static void USBDClass_Reset(u32 uPara)
00320 {
00321   gIsEP1INEmpty = TRUE;
00322   gIsKeySent = FALSE;
00323 
00324   gIsOUTReady = FALSE;
00325   gIsINEmpty = FALSE;
00326   BOT_Init();
00327 }

00343 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00344   * @brief  USB Device Class Request
00345   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00346   * @retval None
00347   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00348 static void USBDClass_Request(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00349 {
00350   u16 uUSBCmd = *((u16 *)(&(pDev->Request)));
00351 
00352 #ifdef RETARGET_IS_USB
00353   SERIAL_USBDClass_Request(pDev);
00354 #endif
00355 
00356   switch (uUSBCmd)
00357   {
00358     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00359     /* | bRequest             | Data transfer direction | Type                | Recipient   | Data          */
00360     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00361 
00362     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00363     /* | 01_Get Report        | 80_Device-to-Host       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 01A1h         */
00364     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00365     case (CLASS_REQ_01_GET_RPOT | REQ_DIR_01_D2H | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00366     {
00367       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld GET RPOT\t[%02d][%02d]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, pDev->Request.wValueH, pDev->Request.wLength);
00368       USBDClass_GetReport(pDev);
00369       break;
00370     }
00371     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00372     /* | 02_Get Idle          | 80_Device-to-Host       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 02A1h         */
00373     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00374     case (CLASS_REQ_02_GET_IDLE | REQ_DIR_01_D2H | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00375     {
00376       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld GET IDLE\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00377       USBDClass_GetIdle(pDev);
00378       break;
00379     }
00380     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00381     /* | 03_Get Protocol      | 80_Device-to-Host       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 03A1h         */
00382     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00383     case (CLASS_REQ_03_GET_PTCO | REQ_DIR_01_D2H | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00384     {
00385       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld GET PTCO\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00386       USBDClass_GetProtocol(pDev);
00387       break;
00388     }
00389     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00390     /* | 09_Set Report        | 00_Host-to-Device       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 0921h         */
00391     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00392     case (CLASS_REQ_09_SET_RPOT | REQ_DIR_00_H2D | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00393     {
00394       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld SET RPOT\t[%02d][%02d]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, pDev->Request.wValueH, pDev->Request.wLength);
00395       USBDClass_SetReport(pDev);
00396       break;
00397     }
00398     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00399     /* | 0A_Set Idle          | 00_Host-to-Device       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 0A21h         */
00400     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00401     case (CLASS_REQ_0A_SET_IDLE | REQ_DIR_00_H2D | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00402     {
00403       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld SET IDLE\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00404       USBDClass_SetIdle(pDev);
00405       break;
00406     }
00407     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00408     /* | 0B_Set Protocol      | 00_Host-to-Device       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 0B21h         */
00409     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00410     case (CLASS_REQ_0B_SET_PTCO | REQ_DIR_00_H2D | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00411     {
00412       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld SET PTCO\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00413       USBDClass_SetProtocol(pDev);
00414       break;
00415     }
00416 
00417     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00418     /* | FE_Get Max LUN       | 80_Device-to-Host       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | FEA1h         */
00419     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00420     case (CLASS_REQ_FE_GET_MAX_LUN | REQ_DIR_01_D2H | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00421     {
00422       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld GET MAX LUN\t[%02d]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, pDev->Request.wIndex);
00423       USBDClass_GetMaxLUN(pDev);
00424       break;
00425     }
00426     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00427     /* | FF_BOMSR             | 00_Host-to-Device       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | FF21h         */
00428     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00429     case (CLASS_REQ_FF_BOMSR | REQ_DIR_00_H2D | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00430     {
00431       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld BOMSR\t[%02d]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, pDev->Request.wIndex);
00432       USBDClass_BulkOnlyMassStorageReset(pDev);
00433       break;
00434     }
00435   }
00436 
00437   return;
00438 }
00439 
00440 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00441   * @brief  USB Device Class Standard Request - GET_DESCRIPTOR
00442   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00443   * @retval None
00444   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00445 static void USBDClass_Standard_GetDescriptor(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00446 {
00447   u32 type = pDev->Request.wValueH;
00448 
00449   switch (type)
00450   {
00451     case DESC_TYPE_21_HID:
00452     {
00453       pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)((pDev->Desc.pConfnDesc) + CLASS_DESC_OFFSET);
00454       pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = DESC_LEN_HID;
00455       pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00456       break;
00457     }
00458     case DESC_TYPE_22_RPOT:
00459     {
00460       pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)(USB_HID_ReportDesc);
00461       pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = DESC_LEN_RPOT;
00462       pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00463       break;
00464     }
00465     case DESC_TYPE_23_PHY:
00466     {
00467       break;
00468     }
00469   } /* switch (type)                                                                                        */
00470 
00471   return;
00472 }

00500 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00501   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - GET_REPORT
00502   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00503   * @retval None
00504   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00505 static void USBDClass_GetReport(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00506 {
00507   u32 value = pDev->Request.wValueH;
00508   u32 len = pDev->Request.wLength;
00509 
00510   switch (value)
00511   {
00512     case HID_RPOT_TYPE_01_INPUT:
00513     {
00514       pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)&(gInputReportBuffer);
00515       pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = len;
00516       pDev->Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00517       break;
00518     }
00519     case HID_RPOT_TYPE_03_FEATURE:
00520     {
00521       break;
00522     }
00523   }
00524 
00525   return;
00526 }
00527

00531   * @retval None
00532   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00533 static void USBDClass_GetIdle(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00534 {
00535   /* Add your own GET_IDLE function here....
00536      For example....
00537 
00538   u32 uReportID  = pDev->Request.wValueL;
00539   u32 uInterface = pDev->Request.wIndex;
00540 
00541   pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)&(__IDLE_DURATION_BUFFER[uReportID]);
00542   pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = 1;
00543   pDev->Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00544 
00545   */
00546   return;

00549 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00550   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - GET_PROTOCOL
00551   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00552   * @retval None
00553   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00554 static void USBDClass_GetProtocol(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00555 {
00556   /* Add your own GET_PROTOCOL function here....
00557      For example....
00558 
00559   u32 uInterface = pDev->Request.wIndex;
00560 
00561   pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)&(__PROTOCOL_BUFFER__);
00562   pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = 1;
00563   pDev->Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00564 
00565   */
00566   return;
00567 }
00568 
00569 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00570   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - SET_REPORT
00571   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00572   * @retval None
00573   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00574 static void USBDClass_SetReport(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00575 {
00576   u32 value = pDev->Request.wValueH;
00577   u32 len = pDev->Request.wLength;
00578   switch (value)
00579   {
00580     case HID_RPOT_TYPE_02_OUTPUT:
00581     {
00582       pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)&(gOutputReportBuffer); // Buffer at least 4 bytes
00583       pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = len;
00584       pDev->Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAOUT;
00585       pDev->Transfer.CallBack_OUT.func = USBDClass_SetReportCallBack;
00586       pDev->Transfer.CallBack_OUT.uPara = len;
00587       break;
00588     }
00589     case HID_RPOT_TYPE_03_FEATURE:
00590     {
00591       break;
00592     }
00593   }
00594 
00595   return;
00596 }
00597 
00598 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00599   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - SET_IDLE
00600   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00601   * @retval None
00602   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00603 static void USBDClass_SetIdle(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00604 {
00605   /* Add your own SET_IDLE function here....
00606      For example....
00607 
00608   u32 uReportID     = pDev->Request.wValueL;
00609   u32 uIdleDuration = pDev->Request.wValueH;
00610   u32 uInterface    = pDev->Request.wIndex;
00611 
00612   __IDLE_DURATION_BUFFER[uReportID] = uIdleDuration;
00613 
00614   */
00615   return;
00616 }
00617 
00618 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00619   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - SET_PROTOCOL
00620   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00621   * @retval None
00622   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00623 static void USBDClass_SetProtocol(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00624 {
00625   /* Add your own SET_PROTOCOL function here....
00626      For example....
00627 
00628   u32 uInterface = pDev->Request.wIndex;
00629   u32 uProtocol  = pDev->Request.wValueL;
00630 
00631   __PROTOCOL_BUFFER = uProtocol;
00632 
00633   */
00634   return;
00635 }
00636 
00637 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00638   * @brief  USB Device SET_REPORT call Back function
00639   * @param  uPara: Parameter for SET_REPORT call back function (SET_REPORT wLength)
00640   * @retval None
00641   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00642 static void USBDClass_SetReportCallBack(u32 uPara)
00643 {
00644   gIsSetOutputReport = TRUE;
00645 
00646   return;
00647 }
00648 
00649 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00650   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - GetMaxLUN
00651   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00652   * @retval None
00653   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00654 static void USBDClass_GetMaxLUN(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00655 {
00656   uc8 *puMaxLun;
00657   if (pDev->Request.wValueL == 0 &&
00658      pDev->Request.wValueH == 0 &&
00659      pDev->Request.wIndex == 0 &&
00660      pDev->Request.wLength == 1   )
00661   {
00662     puMaxLun = BOT_GetMaxLUNAddress();
00663     pDev->Transfer.pData = puMaxLun;
00664     pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = 1;
00665     pDev->Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00666   }
00667 
00668   return;
00669 }
00670 
00671 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00672   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - Bulk-Only Mass Storage Reset
00673   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00674   * @retval None
00675   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00676 static void USBDClass_BulkOnlyMassStorageReset(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00677 {
00678   if (pDev->Request.wValueL == 0 &&
00679      pDev->Request.wValueH == 0 &&
00680      pDev->Request.wIndex == 0 &&
00681      pDev->Request.wLength == 0)
00682   {
00683 
00684     BOT_Reset();
00685 
00686     USBDCore_EPTReset(BOT_IN_EPT);
00687     USBDCore_EPTReset(BOT_OUT_EPT);
00688 
00689     pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00690   }
00691 
00692   return;
00693 }
00694

00699   * @retval None
00700   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00701 static void USBDClass_Endpoint1(USBD_EPTn_Enum EPTn)
00702 {
00703   gIsEP1INEmpty = TRUE;
00704 
00705   __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld EP1IN\t[%02d]\r\n", ++__DBG_USBCount, (int)USBDCore_EPTGetBufferLen(EPTn));
00706   __DBG_USBDump((uc8 *)gInputReportBuffer, USBDCore_EPTGetBufferLen(EPTn));
00707 
00708   return;
00709 }
